rows.VSL AS TRADE: The Video Sales Letter is not a marketing task. It's a Trade with its own assemblages.
A VSL is the single highest-leverage asset in a D2C business.
It converts cold traffic into customers. Everything else — ads, email, retention —
amplifies or follows the VSL. If the VSL doesn't convert, nothing else matters.
A VSL has all the structural properties of a Trade:
• A financial model (what CAC does it produce at what spend level)
• An implementation phase (script → production → testing → scaling)
• Kill criteria (if CPA > $X after $Y spend, kill this angle)
• A post-mortem (what worked, what didn't, what transfers to next VSL)
Treating it as a Trade means it gets the same rigor as the business itself.
Most D2C brands treat VSLs as creative guesswork. We treat them as engineering.

rows.col_2: Core angle, target avatar, primary claim, emotional driver, mechanism
rows.col_3: Business thesis — why this company should exist

rows.col_2: Full VSL script: hook, problem, agitation, mechanism, proof, offer, CTA, objection handling
rows.col_3: ODD-3 Operations — the machine that runs

rows.col_2: Expected CPA at budget tiers, breakeven ROAS, LTV:CAC threshold, scaling curves
Creator agreements, voiceover licensing, music licensing, footage rights, usage terms
Shot list, B-roll requirements, graphics/animations, audio specs, format/length variants
rows.col_3: Product specs — what are we building

rows.col_2: Variables to test, sample sizes, statistical thresholds, winner criteria, iteration rules
Hook variants, CTA variants, length variants, format variants (IG/TT/YT/Meta)
What converted, what dropped off, retention curves, qualitative feedback, lessons for next

rows.col_3: Research angles, study competitors, identify hooks, draft thesis
Write full script, internal review, revise, lock
rows.col_4: Script passes stranger test — someone could produce from script alone

rows.col_3: Creator casting, location/setup, shot list, contracts signed
Edit, add graphics, create variants, format for platforms
Deploy ads, collect data, test hooks/CTAs/lengths, statistical analysis
Increase spend on winner, monitor fatigue, plan next VSL
rows.col_4: CPA stable at scale for 2+ weeks

rows.col_3: Document learnings, update angle library, feed into next Trade
